content: darn knit kinetic cowl by carly stipe start this cowl on saturday morning and you ll be wearing it out to lunch that same day instructions materials *cast on and knit the repeat rounds 1-5 four kinetic cowl loosely more times us15 24 circular needles 1 skein berroco brio cast on 50 stitches and bind off & weave in ends 1 tapestry needle join to knit in the finished size round round 1 purl 9 wide by 28 around round 2 *k1 yo* abbreviations repeat from * to* to end of round co=cast on round 3 knit the knit k=knit stitches and drop the st=stitches yo as you come to them yo=yarnover round 4 purl round 5 knit
